name: EmotionLess (Ancient)
description:
Arrow Keys or w, a, s, d to move

A small Metroidvania Platformer Game made for the Metroidvania Month Game Jam

It is a Metroidvania Platformer in which the objective is to gain two abilities around the map and then confront a demon who has stolen your emotions. There are sprite enemies that will float towards you and upon collision you will lose a life. Can you find your emotions or will you give in to evil?

I apologise for the terrible physics as I challenged myself to not use Unity's physics engine and instead code it myself, this makes for some bugs and issues which I apologise for. I hope you can still enjoy the game and give feedback if possible.
